name: 孫殷同
objective: Introducing special topics of modern and critical manufacturing technology. Including:1. Simulation and verification platform based on computerized manufacturing systems. 2. gamification-based manufacturing flow control and multi-skilled training. 3. Manufacturing experiments and analytical evaluation.
schedule:
Week(s)___Tentative Topic(s)
======    =============
01-05      Introduction and Computer Integrated Manufacturing (CIM)
06-07      Applications of CIM: reverse engineering (RE) and 
                   augmented reality (AR) multi-tasks training
08-09      Midterm project delivery
10-14      Introduction of manufacturing flow control with 
                   gamification: famous production game 
                   for the real-world technology breakthrough
                   (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zZqotxA8_t4&t=15s)
15-16      Manufacturing experiments and numerical evaluation
17-18      Final project delivery
